Class AeBprDeployment

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.axis.EngineConfiguration, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.axis.WSDDEngineConfiguration, org.apache.axis.deployment.wsdd.WSDDTypeMappingContainer
public class AeBprDeployment
extends org.apache.axis.deployment.wsdd.WSDDDeployment

Bpr deployment extends the wsdd deployment of axis for monitoring and setting classloaders used for contexts.

See Also:
